text: Just got the miracle noodles today.Had them for dinner,they tasted better than expected.The "fishy" smell that others had complained about was nearly non existent.The smell rinsed off quickly.They heated easily in boiling water.They accepted the garlic and butter spray flavor very well.The flavor of the noodles plain was similar to ramen noodles.I will buy these many more times.They will certainly help with the diet.My only complaint is that they are a bit expensive.
